metadata.name: 10 - cactoideae
metadata.description:
Inspiration //

I really value exploring creativity under tight constraints. For Gradient Mornings, I created 12 shapes using gradients from colors in MAYC #3040 as my building blocks.

I then composed 1 work/day for 10 days. Each new piece involved the rearrangement of shapes from the previous day. All works were named after the entire collection was created. 

1 - pergola
2 - taraxacum
3 - weighted average illusion
4 - circle packing theorem
5 - equipoise
6 - multivariate
7 - osmosis
8 - appulse
9 - index of refraction
10 - cactoideae
